title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 186.12 - Retention of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 186.12 - Retention of records

State Regulations

The insurer shall maintain complete classification and rating information of the transactions to which this Part applies, for at least the period between statutory examinations by the State of domicile. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 11

186.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
